author: Nerd of the Rings
description:
As the Fellowship departs Lórien, Gimli asks simply for a single hair from Galadriel's head.  Little did he know this request had been made before. The history and significance of this request was greater than he could have ever known - as is Galadriel's response!

To purchase artist work, check out these amazing artists!

title: Galadriel's Gift of Hair to Gimli | Tolkien Explained
